aj1.description: Our old friend AJ came through San Francisco for a quick visit. We hadn't seen each other since 2000! Six years later, the weekly bianca parties are a memory; Lucie has two little boys in tow; and AJ has a bun in the oven.
aj1.title: Aj 1

aj2.description: It was good to see AJ in high spirits. Her baby girl is expected in October.
aj2.title: Aj 2

elias1.description: Elias and dad Nadav came for a visit. The water flowed freely.
elias1.title: Elias 1

elias2.description: Once the little boys were good and wet, we moved on to quieter entertainment.
elias2.title: Elias 2

garden1.description: Our garden is lush.  With weeds.
garden1.title: Garden 1

garden2.description: Seeing as we never ever manage to do the yardwork, we hired a garderner come monthly.  His handiwork starts in the next picture.
garden2.title: Garden 2

garden3.description: See?  We like it, though we also miss our pretty weeds.
garden3.title: Garden 3

georgi1.description:
Georgianna's 4th birthday was held in Tilden Park. She invited all the kids in her New School class.

front left, moving clockwise Kahlil, Kahlil's brother, Amit, Adar, Lula, Nina and mom, Henry and mom Katherine, Jens, Daniele's dad, Felix, Sofia, Emmet, Stepanie (trying to light her daughter's cake), birthday girl Georgianna, and Darshan.
georgi1.title: Georgi 1

georgi2.description:
Felix and Sofia debate which part of the cake looks yummier.

Felix had a sleepover at Sofia's the previous night. He had a great time, as usual.
georgi2.title: Georgi 2

georgi3.description: Kora, Amit and Bennet are ready for the sack race. Suzanne (Sofia's mom) and Ayelet (Amit and Adar's mom) explain to Adar how it's done.
georgi3.title: Georgi 3

georgi4.description: Torin. Felix. Two hula hoops. Three squishy balls.
georgi4.title: Georgi 4

georgi6.description: Georgi wears her paper birthday crown, a New School tradition.  All the other kids decorate it.
georgi6.title: Georgi 6

georgi7.description: Douglas (Georgi's dad) inflates a water bottle with a bike pump until it blows skyward. The dad contingent approves.
georgi7.title: Georgi 7

georgi8.description: Milo and Georgi enjoy a quiet moment. All of Felix's friends are nice to Milo.  Milo loves them for it.
georgi8.title: Georgi 8

somersault1.description: Milo can do front flips really well.  Sometimes when he gets a good bounce his head doesn't even touch.  He practises often.
somersault1.title: Somersault 1

somersault2.description: Dean teaches the fundamentals of back flips.
somersault2.title: Somersault 2

description:
For the last 6 months, Dean has been working on starting a new company with two colleagues from the previous company he helped start. It's been hectic doing his day job AND the new thing. Four weeks ago he went on vacation from his day job to concentrate on the new one. Two weeks ago he quit altogether. We hit a big milestone Friday: the venture capitalists and our lawyers finally completed all the negotiations and 1.5 million dollars has been wired to our bank account. Now we can rent office space and start hiring. Oh yeah, and we can pay ourselves. Dean's title is CTO (Chief Technical Officer).

The company's name? There's a temporary one, but let's not make it any more permanent by putting it in writing.

What does it do? The last company made software for big companies to run their web sites. This time around it is a web site, sort of, and it's for consumers (you). Stay tuned for more details: in a few months YOU may be using it!

In other news, check out this short movie of Milo doing a flip.
title: May 7
